content: Booked a meditation retreat in the Catskills. Time to bring some Zen back to NYC life.
raw_content: Just booked a meditation retreat in the Catskills for when I get back to NYC. Time to integrate what I learned in Japan into my daily life. #mentalhealth #wellness

related_goals.goal: Develop a consistent routine for mental health practices like meditation or yoga
Research and plan a wellness retreat or personal retreat to reset and rejuvenate
